items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars True to size
items.body: Love it the material is so comfy Read more
items.author: Sheyla Campos

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nights Got Better For Sure
items.body: Unlike more conventional chemises this lace nightgown is a gorgeous piece. Its most unique characteristic is the asymmetrical hem which creates a contemporary highly attractive silhouette that is both sophisticated and playful. The overall lacework is delicate and attractive and the V neck is deep and seductive without being unduly exposed. The comprehensive size range S XXL which makes this fashionable design suitable for a wider range of body shapes, also pleased me. This nightgown fulfills its promise of a sensual stylish appearance whether it is worn for a particular occasion or just to feel opulent. The practical aspects of fit and comfort are where the experience loses half a rating. The fabric has very little elasticity but the size variety is great. This implies that your particular dimensions will have a significant impact on getting the flawless flowing fit that is depicted in the product photos. For comfort it is highly recommended that you get a size higher if you are in between sizes because an excessively tight fit may cause the lace to feel a little scratchy against your skin. Although it adds to its allure the gown's light weight makes it ideal for warmer climates or people who do not mind a breeze. Although careful sizing is required this chemise is a lovely and valuable investment. It is the type of underwear that gives you a sense of self worth and uniqueness. Although it should be hand washed to protect the delicate lace and keep its shape the quality is decent for the price range. Read more
items.author: MCLOVEN

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sexy, Elegant, and Comfortable
items.body: I recently purchased the CRIPOM lace nightgown, and it has quickly become a favorite in my lingerie collection. The delicate lace detailing along the neckline and hem adds an elegant and romantic touch, while the asymmetrical hem gives it a modern, flattering silhouette that drapes beautifully on the body. The V-neck design enhances the neckline without feeling too revealing, striking the perfect balance between sexy and sophisticated. The fabric is soft and lightweight, making it extremely comfortable to wear throughout the night or for lounging at home. Despite its delicate appearance, the stitching and overall construction feel durable and well-made. I found the sizing accurate—the XX-Large fit perfectly without being too tight or loose, providing both confidence and ease of movement. What I love most is how versatile this nightgown feels. It’s perfect for special evenings, but it’s also comfortable enough to wear casually around the house. The breathable material keeps it comfortable even on warmer nights, and it holds up well after washing without losing shape or softness. Overall, this CRIPOM lace nightgown combines style, comfort, and a flattering fit in one piece. It’s ideal for anyone looking for lingerie that feels luxurious, looks elegant, and can be worn both for special occasions and everyday comfort. Read more
items.author: Coodyscoops

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and flattering for most body types
items.body: This is a beautiful chemise. The color pops (I have a lot of lingerie in other colors so it was nice to have something different). I am 5'5" and about 145 lbs and pretty rectangle shaped. This is flattering for my body type. Good for B cups as well (which I am). The hem is gorgeous and the material is light and airy - and see through in all the right areas which is a big plus. Hides mid section flaws well. Sincerely, for $10 you really can't go wrong. Comes with a matching G string which is ok - nothing fancy and pretty cheap but I like anything in lingerie that has easy access. And it's not like you're really seeing it anyway. My husband likes it (which is what matters) and I recommend it highly! Read more
items.author: peters-sweetie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very flattering fit and true sizing
items.body: Absolutely beautiful and color is as vibrant as description. Very comfortable and the fit is very flattering. Size appears to be accurate. Overall the quality is very good and washes well. Read more
items.author: Brittany Downing

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars neon pink sheer lace with gentle support
items.body: This lacy nightie is very sheer but it does give just enough coverage that I feel more confident of areas that I otherwise wouldn't. It provides a bit of gentle bust lift and support. Not a lot, but it's something. The lace is soft and stretchy and not scratchy. The fit seems true to size. The panties are not really functional and are just for show but they do match if you want to add them. The color is very bright, almost neon. It's not elegant, but neither is this cute little thing. It's definitely eye-catching. Read more
items.author: Miss Ti

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars My husband adored it...
items.body: I don't wear a lot of lingerie because honestly, I'm lazy. But this is a nice alternative to restrictive corsets or garter belts. Very sexy and comfortable - at a much better price than Victoria's Secret. I fell asleep in it. My husband asked me to order more. Read more
items.author: Chelsea P.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and comfortable nighty
items.body: This is definitely a cute nighty set. The fabric is very comfortable. The lace is very soft and the skirt is very flowy. They do come with the thong panty, which my husband and I joke and call "why bother undies" LOL as for the quality I would be very cautious while washing, I don't know how long this would hold up in the washer and dryer. I launder all of my nighties in a delicate bag and they go through washer and dryer without a problem. If you don't have a delicate bag to use, I would 100% hand wash. Read more
items.author: sweetirishct

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, White, Hot Pink, Black, Light Pink, Navy Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
